businessProfile.name: Mimmo's Brick Oven Pizza & Trattoria
businessProfile.address: 15 Giffords Ln, Staten Island, NY 10308, USA

reviews.text: I had the most incredible baby shower at Mimmos! The party room spaciously fit 40 people with plenty of room for a balloon arch, candy table and gifts! The wait staff was attentive, friendly and professional, they went above and beyond from our initial consult until the party was over. All of my guest raved about the food, during and after the party, especially the margarita pizza, penne vodka and chicken francese. I am looking forward to my next party and dinner at Mimmos!

my favorite place to eat, mvp hot honey pizza, riceballs, penne vodka (add their breaded chicken to it it‚Äôs amazinggg) , chicken francese, their fried zuchini sticks are my absolute favorite i will come here just for them alone, couldn‚Äôt recommend them enough, and the staff is always the sweetest 10/10

We recently had our son‚Äòs first birthday at MIMMOS and it was a really great party. The staff was very friendly and attentive during the entire party. The margarita brick oven pizza was delicious and everyone said that in general, the food was great. I booked a party with Rob and she was very Responsive and addressed all my needs the room offered a perfect amount of space for entertaining and decorating they offer several packages tailored to your needs and a very affordable I would highly recommend this restaurant just for dinner or for your next party.

Wonderful experience! Great food and the service was amazing! We decided to book this
restaurant‚Äôs party room for my sister‚Äôs bridal shower and it was the best decision we made!  The owners were very accommodating and so helpful when our decorating team came in to do their work. The staff were all top notch- kind, attentive and professional. We had such a great experience here and hope to come again very soon!!
The Sacchetti was DELICIOUS. Highly recommend it (and vegetarian friendly). The pizza was alright. Ambiance was great and staff was friendly and accommodating. Loved the experience!

detailedReviews.author: Douglas McFee
detailedReviews.text: We‚Äôve gone to Mimmo‚Äôs for several family parties and always have a great time. The food is delicious and the service is excellent. We also love going mid-week for their 2-for-1 dinner specials. This is a family owned business who treat their customers like family.

detailedReviews.author: Nicole D
detailedReviews.text: I could not recommend Mimmo‚Äôs enough!  I hosted my son‚Äôs graduation party there and it was perfect.  From the planning to the actual party, Rob was a pleasure to deal with.  The food was excellent, the staff was attentive, and everything was exactly what we wanted.  They made sure everyone was happy and accommodated dietary restrictions easily.  We will absolutely be back soon!

detailedReviews.author: Lisa Albanese
detailedReviews.text: We recently had our son‚Äòs first birthday at MIMMOS and it was a really great party. The staff was very friendly and attentive during the entire party. The margarita brick oven pizza was delicious and everyone said that in general, the food was great. I booked a party with Rob and she was very Responsive and addressed all my needs the room offered a perfect amount of space for entertaining and decorating they offer several packages tailored to your needs and a very affordable I would highly recommend this restaurant just for dinner or for your next party.

detailedReviews.author: Kathryn Annunziata
detailedReviews.text: The food was spectacular! We can't wait to go back.

detailedReviews.author: Marko Miletic
detailedReviews.text: After seeing the instagram video of the focaccia bread sandwich I knew I needed one. All of the staff, especially Luca (big shoutout to him) were so supportive and helpful while allowing me to customize my sandwich. I wound up deciding on a fried eggplant, sun dried tomato, burrata, pesto mayo and balsamic glaze on focaccia bread sandwich. They don‚Äôt mess around with their fresh fried eggplant, delicious pesto mayo and perfect focaccia bread. Cant wait to come back for my next sandwich.

detailedReviews.author: Christina Colavito
detailedReviews.text: Where do I begin? if you're looking to book a party or even get a slice this is the place. I have had so many parties there and Mimmos has become family to us! Rob and his workers there are amazing and we can always count on them for our parties and food. They are so personable, accommodating and just everything. The place is beautiful and everything you need for a intimate party.

detailedReviews.author: Lynda Amore
detailedReviews.text: Had my son‚Äôs first birthday here and it was great food was amazing and staff was great highly recommend going here for a party or just for dinner

detailedReviews.author: Nicole christine
detailedReviews.text: I had the most incredible baby shower at Mimmos! The party room spaciously fit 40 people with plenty of room for a balloon arch, candy table and gifts! The wait staff was attentive, friendly and professional, they went above and beyond from our initial consult until the party was over. All of my guest raved about the food, during and after the party, especially the margarita pizza, penne vodka and chicken francese. I am looking forward to my next party and dinner at Mimmos!

detailedReviews.author: Maria Corso
detailedReviews.text: I had my daughter‚Äôs baby shower here and it was wonderful, the service, the food and everything about it. We had amazing waiters who continued to check on us and make sure everything was perfect , the margarita pie, chicken Francese and etc was incredible. I highly recommend this place, as well as their new location on Arthur kill.

detailedReviews.author: virginia valenza
detailedReviews.text:
The food was delicious, and our server
Rob L was great

detailedReviews.author: Jeff Mertzel
detailedReviews.text: Went to the new  Location on ArthurKill road  first time today. got a Eggplant parmesan hero best I ever had ....

detailedReviews.author: Evangalee Gonzalez
detailedReviews.text:
I just wanted to say a big thank you to the entire team at Mimmo‚Äôs, especially Robert, for such a wonderful dining experience! We had a going away party for my coworker on Sunday evening and it was beautiful. From the moment we walked in, we felt welcomed and taken care of. The service was friendly and attentive without being overbearing, and every dish we ordered was absolutely delicious ‚Äî fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented.

It‚Äôs clear that a lot of care and pride goes into both the food and the atmosphere here. We especially loved the brick oven pizza, and we‚Äôll definitely be back to try more. Thanks again for such a memorable evening!

detailedReviews.author: Lauren Cardieri
detailedReviews.text: We had a ‚Äúretirement party‚Äù for our friend here Sunday evening. The food was phenomenal and the whole staff was very hospitable. The place was affordable for what we were looking for and checked every box. Rob was a great help in making sure this all happened and everything ran smoothly. Very satisfied with the turn out!

detailedReviews.author: Paula McKeown
detailedReviews.text: Excellent service and a great comedy show!

detailedReviews.author: Fuggetta Contracting Corp
detailedReviews.text: Excellent Food and Service.

detailedReviews.author: Rusi Bajue
detailedReviews.text: Wonderful place! The service was great and the food was delicious!

detailedReviews.author: mendel levertov
detailedReviews.text:
The kids got and loved the spaghetti and meatballs. They raved on and on about it.
The staff was awesome and kind
The deserts were pretty Awesome too.

detailedReviews.author: Janessa Martinez
detailedReviews.text: I hosted my father‚Äôs retirement/birthday here. I cannot say enough good things about this place. Rob helped me set everything up, he was so helpful and so easy to work with. The food was so good from start to finish, everyone told me how much they enjoyed it. The staff were very friendly and accommodating. It was the perfect place and we will certainly be booking again for further events.

detailedReviews.author: Kristen Mavaro
detailedReviews.text: My sister and I had our birthday dinner here in the private room and it was such a lovely experience. The food, service and atmosphere were everything and more than both of us could ask for. Rob and the rest of the staff were so gracious and attentive the entire time, and always made sure our group was taken care of. I can‚Äôt say good enough things about this restaurant, and I can‚Äôt wait to come back again!!

detailedReviews.author: Gina Thomas
detailedReviews.text:
Wonderful experience! Great food and the service was amazing! We decided to book this
restaurant‚Äôs party room for my sister‚Äôs bridal shower and it was the best decision we made!  The owners were very accommodating and so helpful when our decorating team came in to do their work. The staff were all top notch- kind, attentive and professional. We had such a great experience here and hope to come again very soon!!

detailedReviews.author: Taylor Mavaro
detailedReviews.text: I recommend this place to anyone and everyone! Not only is the food amazing and authentic Italian, but the ambience is superb. The party room is perfect for any event. I highly recommend! ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüî•

detailedReviews.author: Michele Pearson
detailedReviews.text: Attended two parties there in the last couple of months. The food is delicious. The service is top notch. The owners made us all feel like family. Highly recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Kimberley Pecorino
detailedReviews.text:
My mom hosted my baby shower there this past summer so when it was time for me to plan a party, I didn‚Äôt think twice about location. The entire process from planning my son‚Äôs birthday party to the very end of the event, was more than I could have asked for. Rob was phenomenal to work with- he answered every question thoroughly and in a timely manner, dealt with all of my requests making me feel like family and as if I were no bother at all (especially day of when I bothered him a million times). The staff were kind, polite,  attentive to my guests and great to interact with. The food was amazing as always. When I sent out invites, people were so excited to hear we would be going back to Mimmo‚Äôs and the people who didn‚Äôt pay attention to the invite were texting me day of equally excited, raving about how good the food is! Can‚Äôt thank Rob & the Mimmo‚Äôs team enough for helping make my son‚Äôs birthday party truly perfect!

The millennial in me would love nice fresh,  light paint so the restaurant decor didn‚Äôt interfere with the party decorations hahaha but we made it work and will do so in the future!

detailedReviews.author: Marianne Torres
detailedReviews.text:
I recently had the pleasure of attending a baby shower at Mimmos Trattoria, and I can confidently say it was an unforgettable experience. From the moment we walked in, the atmosphere was warm, inviting, and perfect for such a special occasion. The space was beautifully set up, offering an elegant yet cozy ambiance that made everyone feel right at home.

The service was exceptional ‚Äì the staff went above and beyond to ensure that everything ran smoothly, offering attentive and friendly service without ever being intrusive. It was clear that they were truly invested in making the event memorable for everyone involved.

As for the food, it was nothing short of spectacular. Every dish was a celebration of authentic Italian flavors, from the rich pastas to the perfectly seasoned meats, all beautifully presented. The variety of options available for the event was impressive, and each plate was bursting with fresh, high-quality ingredients. Guests couldn‚Äôt stop raving about the delicious flavors and thoughtful preparation.

The wine selection was also outstanding, offering the perfect pairings for the meal, and adding a refined touch to the celebration. It was the ideal setting for a baby shower ‚Äì a combination of outstanding food, exceptional service, and an atmosphere that made everyone feel like family.

If you‚Äôre looking for a venue that offers top-notch service, mouthwatering cuisine, and an unforgettable experience for your next special event, Mimmos Trattoria is an absolute must. I can‚Äôt wait to return!

detailedReviews.author: Maria Plumeri
detailedReviews.text: I was at a baby shower and can‚Äôt say enough on how delicious the food was the servers were excellent loved the private room just a great place to have a party

detailedReviews.author: Mary Ann Murphy
detailedReviews.text: This was the second time we were there for a party and both times the food was excellent as was the service and staff.

detailedReviews.author: Carmella Sattarova
detailedReviews.text:
Best pizza place on the island in my opinion. From their delicious MVP (my absolute fav) to their bolognese pasta, absolute perfection.  Mimmos NEVER disappoints ever.

Besides the amazing food, the staff is the absolute best. You can tell that they actually care about their customers. I‚Äôm always greeting with a smile. Love the staff

You want great food? Go to mimmos
You want the best service? Go to mimmos

detailedReviews.author: Christopher Iengo
detailedReviews.text: Actor Christopher Iengo ty mimmos always perfect pizza deliziuoso,staff and esp Gianna taking care of me n my take out orders all the best

detailedReviews.author: Asal Zakirova
detailedReviews.text: Their chicken cutlet, bruschetta and fresh mozzarella wrap is literally perfection üëåüèªüòçüòç so good 10/10 Also I lovee their pizza slices and penne vodka üî•üî•üî•

detailedReviews.author: Sara Fahim
detailedReviews.text: I had a terrible experience at this restaurant. I ordered a small pasta, but when the bill came, I was charged for a large. I brought it to their attention the day after I realized, but the staff refused to refund me the difference saying that I‚Äôm lying and it was the big portion!! The whole situation was dishonest, with misleading prices and portions. I paid for something bigger than what I got, and they wouldn't do anything to fix it that‚Äôs not costumer service. I definitely won't be coming back, and I wouldn't recommend this place to anyone who values honesty.

detailedReviews.author: Joseph Buro
detailedReviews.text: They have been there a long time but always under my radar. The food is great though. They should make their back dining area linked with the front a little more.

detailedReviews.author: Landon Dyer
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza, my favorite on the island. Has tasted consistently good for many years. MVP, chicken parm, and meatball pies are my favorite. Their dinner entrees and wraps  are really good as well. Chicken rolls are big and have a lot of flavor. Hope they stay around for years to come

detailedReviews.author: Gary C
detailedReviews.text: Good deal food was good!!!

detailedReviews.author: Michael Giordano
detailedReviews.text:
Love the food here but must say.. ordered grilled chicken salad multiple times and they‚Äôre very stingy on the chicken. I took out the food scale today and it was a whopping 3.4 ounces of chicken.

*Adding since they replied*

We rotate on places and I have been weighing the chicken everywhere, because I count protein macros. Village Maria right across the street gives between 8 - 9 ounces, along with most pizza places we order from, same with diners. 3.4 ounces is not the norm.

Perhaps it was a mistake on your part, but the scale doesn‚Äôt lie.

Also, wasn‚Äôt gonna mention it but catered from here Xmas Eve and lots of the food was pretty unseasoned, especially the meatballs. Not sure what happened.

detailedReviews.author: Charles Mantione
detailedReviews.text: My mother and I had lunch today at Mimmo‚Äôs.  We had a small grilled chicken Caesar salad along with a small margarita pie.  The salad was fresh, crisp and tasted great! The pizza was amazing!!! The undercarriage had a nice patina, very crunchy but not burnt. The sauce was zesty and fresh. I spoke with Luca, a very warm, pleasant operator. He said that the dough, cheese and sauce is made fresh every day. It did not disappoint! Go, Run, to Mimmo‚Äôs! See Luca, and enjoy, like I did with my mom today! A 10 out of 10 day!

detailedReviews.author: Rivka Jakubowicz
detailedReviews.text: My son‚Äòs 50th surprise party was at the restaurant, I couldn‚Äôt ask for better food or better service. Everybody was just wonderful.

detailedReviews.author: Amanda Adinolfi
detailedReviews.text:
We hosted a baby shower for my sister here and it was an amazing experience! The staff was so attentive and accommodating, not to mention the food was delicious! I couldn‚Äôt recommend Mimmo‚Äôs enough!

Rob went out of his way to make sure everyone was comfortable and to make sure the party went off without a hitch!

detailedReviews.author: Rosanna Engel
detailedReviews.text: BIG Thank you to Rob, Ralph and all of the staff at Mimmos, For all of your special attention to quality service most excellent and delicious food, atmosphere which feels warm and cozy!! Our retirement celebration for a Dear Co- worker turned out fantastic because of your professionalism and exceptional entertaining business! I cant say enough about the food, it was high quality at an affordable price!!! We will be back!!

detailedReviews.author: Lynda Browning
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely wonderful in every way! Delicious home cooking, friendliest service ever and beautiful atmosphere..cannot say enough good things! Will definitely be back!!!

detailedReviews.author: C R
detailedReviews.text: Unexpected gem of a restaurant with outstanding, reasonably priced food, and fabulous service.  What a warm and welcoming atmosphere to dine in. Looking to meet friends 1/2way between NJ and Brooklyn and found Mimmo‚Äôs.  So glad we did!  Couldn‚Äôt have asked for better food or service!!

detailedReviews.author: Carter Walsh
detailedReviews.text: We got a peperoni personal pie, a caesar salad, and chicken parm with vodka sauce. The pizza was very good! I would say an 8.2 on the portnoy scale. The salad was also pretty good. I really liked the olives and warm bread. The chicken parm was good but pretty average not amazing. We really liked the vodka sauce. The back dining area was really nice and the server was great. Prices were really good but the $6 up charge for vodka sauce was a bit much. Cant blame them though since everything else was pretty reasonable price

detailedReviews.author: Lord Rak
detailedReviews.text: True pizza...brick oven baked and plain delicious.

detailedReviews.author: Phillip LiMandri
detailedReviews.text:
Food was fresh and fun. The brick oven chicken cutlet with fresh mozzarella prosciutto and roasted peppers. (Amazing).  Penne with home made vodka sauce! Even had a zeppole topped with Nutella. Mimmos hits it out of the park!
Impeccable service (thank you Rob) The waiters were constantly checking beverages and taking away finished plates. I came for a party and normally do not enjoy hall food but this restaurant suprised me with better quality  top notch food and service!
I'll be back

detailedReviews.author: Stephanie Rose
detailedReviews.text: Had my Daughter‚Äôs 1st birthday in the party room everything was great . The staff was very attentive food amazing. Would definitely recommend having parties there .

detailedReviews.author: Mike Matteo
detailedReviews.text: excellent food excellent service and always fast, hot and ready

detailedReviews.author: Vincent laera
detailedReviews.text: Food is the best !!! Ralph, Rob, and Nicole always treat me like family when I‚Äôm there

detailedReviews.author: Nicole Comito
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic food, great environment and wonderful service from the staff! Their half tray specials are so affordable and you truly do get your moneys worth. Along with that, they have a beautiful dining room for parties! My family has books almost all of our events here. Highly recommend this spot if you haven‚Äôt given it a try! 10/10 :)

detailedReviews.author: John Compoccia
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôve been to many pizzerias on Staten Island and mimmos is by far one of the best I‚Äôve ever had ! Best pizza on the mid shore , great deals , buy one get one 4 days a week in the back restaurant great bar and 10 dollar pies on Monday and Tuesdays ! Crispy delicious pizza all types of custom pies to try and can‚Äôt be beat for the deals they have . There Italian food is very good aswell to compliment there terrific slices

detailedReviews.author: jmorsy morsy
detailedReviews.text: amazing food MUST TRYYY!! service was great and amazing, everyone was very sweet and polite. the dining room and pizzeria side are both fantastic places where you can sit and enjoy your food!

detailedReviews.author: Zohar Malka
detailedReviews.text: The food is delicious high quality pastas and fish, pizza was thin crust and well done which is the only way to do it! Complements to the chef

detailedReviews.author: Ann Delgado
detailedReviews.text: Came in from NJ for dinner. Deeelicious. I‚Äôm disappointed that the room not available for our baby‚Äôs Christening. But, we will visit again.

detailedReviews.author: Britney Matthews
detailedReviews.text: We have always heard good things about this spot and figured we should check it out. It lived up to all of our expectations. The food was great, the drinks were great, the waitress was very great and knew all about the menu. Great experience and will be returning!

detailedReviews.author: ART B
detailedReviews.text: Came from canada to visit family and found this pizza place and it is on point.   Great service and pizza is delicious 5 stars

detailedReviews.author: glenford jeffrey
detailedReviews.text: Got delivered all the way to Freehold Jeep by Raffaele himself as promised.. Pizza was Absolutely Divine!! It was a hit a the dealership and we 100% will be going there in person to support this amazing establishment.. keep up the great work!!

detailedReviews.author: Mark
detailedReviews.text:
The sweetness of the sauce is great
Good flavored Pizza
8.2/10

detailedReviews.author: Liana Delgado
detailedReviews.text: Had my sons 1st birthday party here over the weekend and the service was fantastic! The food was great and served in a timely manner. Plenty of space for the 40 people we had! Will definitely host another even here in the future!

detailedReviews.author: Kim PAssarelli
detailedReviews.text: Impeccable service great atmosphere, delicious food. Robert was an exceptional host and made sure that my daughters sprinkle was everything I was looking for and more

detailedReviews.author: Ralph Passarelli
detailedReviews.text: Amazing! Highly recommend! Thank you Robert.

detailedReviews.author: Richard Masak
detailedReviews.text: food is great and came quickly

detailedReviews.author: Desiree Ditre
detailedReviews.text: Had my sisters baby shower at Mimmo‚Äôs. Had a great time. Food was delicious. Room was set up and clean. The service was great. Will definitely recommend to other people. Thank you so much.

detailedReviews.author: Kat
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza place ever!! Never disappointed, I order the pasta carbonara religiously, and I truly don‚Äôt know another pizza place that compares to their regular cheese pizza. My family is obsessed with the MVP and honey pepperoni pizza. I want to personally give a BIG thank you to their amazing manager Nicole! She always makes sure my order is correct and does a great job in every way! Love this place!!!

detailedReviews.author: Chris Potoczki
detailedReviews.text: Fail to see the great reviews for this place. Placed an order with DoorDash and this is how my food came. Are they struggling that badly I get a chicken and a half? Who serves someone like this where they cut off a piece of chicken and give it to someone else. Outrageous. To top it off, it‚Äôs super dry. Never will order from here again! How this place is number 1 on the island is beyond me!

detailedReviews.author: Michael Hecht
detailedReviews.text: Best chicken parm rolls on the island! Not sure why it's delivery-only for that particular item, but still. Good stuff.

detailedReviews.author: richard rodriguez
detailedReviews.text: I don't  know what happened but last week I ordered a grandma pie and it the crust tasted like wet cardboard happened once before thought it was a bad day but two in a row I got to find a new place

detailedReviews.author: Shannon G
detailedReviews.text: We just celebrated our daughter's 2nd birthday at Mimmos!! It was great‚ù§Ô∏è, the food was amazing, the staff awesome and the party room was well decorated, clean and spacious!! We truly enjoyed ourselves !! Thank you Mimmos !!

detailedReviews.author: Joanna Bettini
detailedReviews.text: I threw my wife a surprise party,  everything was amazing. Service was top Notch. Rob was an absolute pleasure to work with.

detailedReviews.author: Viola
detailedReviews.text: We love coming here when visiting NYC from VA. My local friend always ordered take out from here and I just love their White Sauce Clam Linguine and Garlic Knots. Their pizza is great too.

detailedReviews.author: Davit Utiashvili
detailedReviews.text: I bought 2 slices of pizza and paid by card for $10. 3 days later, they also charged 8 dollars from my card without asking. I was there and when I asked why it happened, we don't know, they gave me an answer

detailedReviews.author: Tommy Sosa
detailedReviews.text: Great service always and everything I've ordered here has been top notch, there are many pizza shops in the vicinity of this place and I've had an all around better experience with Mimmos. Give it a try, you won't be disappointed.

detailedReviews.author: Lisa Palmer
detailedReviews.text: Food , service , atmosphere all 10 out of 10! We have eaten here before for dinner and loved it so decided to have our daughters communion party at Mimmos. They went above and beyond to make sure everything was perfect and it was!

detailedReviews.author: Frances Deluca
detailedReviews.text: Thank you  to everyone that helped out yesterday i had my daughter 13 birthday her yesterday it was beautiful every one was so nice yesterday very helpful every one at my party can't stop talking about the food and the staff and the place it was really a nice night

detailedReviews.author: Alexia Vassiliadis
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely amazing. We love coming here! The food and the service is the best you can get. And the vodka sauce is even better!!!!

detailedReviews.author: alexis gambino
detailedReviews.text: Mimmo‚Äôs is the best pizzeria and restaurant on the island!!! The food is absolutely amazing and the staff is even more amazing !!! My favorite place !

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.7/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers rave about the delicious and unique pizza offerings like the MVP hot honey pizza and vodka chicken parm pizza. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The restaurant is praised for hosting exceptional family parties and accommodating dietary restrictions, making it a perfect venue for events. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
The friendly and attentive staff, particularly during events, enhances the dining experience and makes customers feel like family. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
improvementOpportunities: Inconsistent portion sizes and pricing issues - review management can address this concern
Negative reviews about food quality and incorrect charges - review management can address this concern
Limited pizza selection availability and running out of popular items - Boostly marketing services can improve this

positive.author: Nicole Zappala
positive.text:
My FAVORITE pizza lately!!!
Been obsessing over their eggplant parm roll & vodka chicken parm pizza!!

positive.author: Gianna Otero
positive.text: my favorite place to eat, mvp hot honey pizza, riceballs, penne vodka (add their breaded chicken to it it‚Äôs amazinggg) , chicken francese, their fried zuchini sticks are my absolute favorite i will come here just for them alone, couldn‚Äôt recommend them enough, and the staff is always the sweetest 10/10

neutral.author: Michael Giordano
neutral.text:
Love the food here but must say.. ordered grilled chicken salad multiple times and they‚Äôre very stingy on the chicken. I took out the food scale today and it was a whopping 3.4 ounces of chicken.

*Adding since they replied*

We rotate on places and I have been weighing the chicken everywhere, because I count protein macros. Village Maria right across the street gives between 8 - 9 ounces, along with most pizza places we order from, same with diners. 3.4 ounces is not the norm.

Perhaps it was a mistake on your part, but the scale doesn‚Äôt lie.

Also, wasn‚Äôt gonna mention it but catered from here Xmas Eve and lots of the food was pretty unseasoned, especially the meatballs. Not sure what happened.

negative.author: Sara Fahim
negative.text: I had a terrible experience at this restaurant. I ordered a small pasta, but when the bill came, I was charged for a large. I brought it to their attention the day after I realized, but the staff refused to refund me the difference saying that I‚Äôm lying and it was the big portion!! The whole situation was dishonest, with misleading prices and portions. I paid for something bigger than what I got, and they wouldn't do anything to fix it that‚Äôs not costumer service. I definitely won't be coming back, and I wouldn't recommend this place to anyone who values honesty.

negative.author: Chris Potoczki
negative.text: Fail to see the great reviews for this place. Placed an order with DoorDash and this is how my food came. Are they struggling that badly I get a chicken and a half? Who serves someone like this where they cut off a piece of chicken and give it to someone else. Outrageous. To top it off, it‚Äôs super dry. Never will order from here again! How this place is number 1 on the island is beyond me!

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
